title: Justin Madders – 2020 Comments on Working Conditions for Midwives
author: admin
summary: Comments made by Justin Madders, the Shadow Health Minister, on 20 August 2020.
content:
[Commenting on the Royal College of Midwives survey that shows midwives are missing meals and toilet breaks]
